Iris:

* Iris had almost thought that she had answered all of Ramulus' questions, 
until he asked about a counter to the effects.
She sighed.
What did they think she was, the one program whom knew the answeres to 
everything?!
But then again, she basically DID know everything, she she guessed that she 
might as well give it a try and look for the counter.*

" Hold on..."

* Again, she gave her systems a good going over, except this time it did 
take longer, there was a lot of data to go through.
Finally she narrowed it down to a few basic counter weapons, and simple 
downloadable programs.
They all aggeared on seperage screens the surrounded Ramulus.
She highlighted the first with a rather nasty looking weapon.*

" This is the 3 100. It's mainly used to carry viruses and can infect over a 
long distance. Or...can be loaded with an antivirus.
Either way it can carry a counter to that chip which was fired.
Same with this weapon..."

* Iris displayed it as well and the other after that, all weapons cappable 
of carrying the counter.
Then she began to display the programs.*

" These are all modified counterviruses...as well as default programs.
They basically can either wipe clean the programming that the viction has 
recieved...or can kill them in the process.
It's a delicate process, one that takes time.
The programs have to be loaded properly in order for them to do their 
job...and not kill."

* Iris knew that SHE could load the program so that it would work, she did 
have the precision of a calculated geniouse...after all.
But, she would have to make a weaponry holding stand with nano-probs, and it 
would only take about 3 mega-cycles at the longest.*

______________________________Zyber.

* Zyber watched as the beast drained the cup, her eyes wide.
How could he just gizzle it like that, it was strong as the Pit...and it 
even took her hours to finish.*

" Uh...I think you were attacked. I...uh...just found you in stasis lock on 
the forest floor at dusk.*
